The statement made by Texas Governor Ric: de-fund" Planned Parenthood and close abortion clinics in Texas.
Confirmation from Sarah Wheat: interim co-CEO of the Austin-area Planned Parenthood, that none of the clinics Perry referenced provided abortions and that 11, not 12, clinics closed.
Information from Carrie Williams: a spokeswoman for the Texas Department of State Health Services, confirming that abortion clinics do not receive state or federal funding and that the closed clinics had received state funding in 2011.
Perry: s repetition of his characterization of the shuttered clinics at a Republican Party event, as reported by KVUE-TV.
